root.name: U Want Cookie?
root.description: OverviewThe goal in U Want Cookie? is to get to the cookie in each level without dying. The first two levels are easy, fairly simple jumps and cliffs, that it advances to more difficult obstacles such as lasers and land mines.MultiplayerThe main goal in multiplayer is still to get the cookie, but now the players race for it. Instead of the set levels, levels apear at random to confuse the player.
